snippet: The 2015 world indoor lacrosse championship will be held at the Onondaga Nation Arena outside Syracuse and First Niagara Center in Buffalo.
lead_paragraph: The 2015 world indoor lacrosse championship will be held at the Onondaga Nation Arena outside Syracuse and First Niagara Center in Buffalo.

headline.main: World Indoor Event to Be Played in New York State
headline.print_headline: World Indoor Event to Be Played in New York State
